name: Abundant Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When Abundant Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

name: Angelic Gift
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has flying.
flavor_text: "Zendikar will triumph this day, and our armies will fly with angels."

name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

name: Bant Panorama
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Bant Panorama: Search your library for a basic Forest, Plains, or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Bant's hearts are as pure as its air and as bright as its skies.

name: Bojuka Bog
oracle_text:
Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard.
{T}: Add {B}.

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

name: Commander's Sphere
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "The heavens augur weal . . . for me. Woe for you."

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text:
"Approach my tower on bended knee or depart from it as ash upon the wind."
—Gadwick, the Wizened

name: Eel Umbra
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Esper Panorama
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Esper Panorama: Search your library for a basic Plains, Island, or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Esper is an expansive canvas painted by precise, controlling hands.

name: Explore
oracle_text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

name: Explorer's Scope
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The true strength of nature is not the raging storm or the charging rhino, but the inexorable vitality of life.

name: Gruul Signet
flavor_text: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

name: Halimar Depths
oracle_text:
Halimar Depths enters the battlefield tapped.
When Halimar Depths enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{T}: Add {U}.

name: Mortuary Mire
oracle_text:
Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
{T}: Add {B}.

name: Nature's Lore
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Druidcraft is a simple invocation to spirits of nature, promising a glimpse of nature's secrets.

name: Orazca Relic
oracle_text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Orazca Relic: You gain 3 life and draw a card. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

name: Path of Ancestry
oracle_text:
Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees."
—Emmara

name: Rile
oracle_text:
Rile deals 1 damage to target creature you control. That creature gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The enormous can still be at the mercy of the small.

name: Ronom Unicorn
oracle_text: Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

name: Shielding Plax
oracle_text:
({G/U} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.)
Enchant creature
When Shielding Plax enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

name: Terramorphic Expanse
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

name: Thriving Grove
oracle_text:
Thriving Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Grove enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: Far from human eyes, birds flit between vivid blossoms in a hidden paradise.

name: Thriving Heath
oracle_text:
Thriving Heath enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Heath enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

name: Thriving Isle
oracle_text:
Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

name: Thriving Moor
oracle_text:
Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.

name: Utopia Sprawl
oracle_text:
Enchant Forest
As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

name: Viridian Longbow
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

name: Wayfarer's Bauble
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Druids hold certain plants to be sacred and use their leaves and wood as a spellcasting focus.

name: Wild Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
flavor_text: If you stop to listen, you can hear it grow.
